QueryText: farmer want to know information about Bhavantar Yojna ?
KccAns: For information on Kisan Bhai Bhavantar Yojana, number 18002332501,0755-2550495 Please contact.
NO RAIN POSSIBILITY IN NEXT 3 DAYS AND CLOUD

QueryText: Grubs remain in the soil and feed on rootlets. Affected plants with yellow colour, drooping of immature nuts, and gradual drying of such plants.
KccAns:
After monsoon rain with help of light collect the emerged adults between 7.30 - 8.30 PM.
Drench 10 ml. Chlorpyriphos 20 EC. in a lit. water to the base of the tree.
suggested : All information provided  thanks for calling in kisan call center

QueryText: Farmer needs information regarding control measure of fungal disease in  lentil   crop?
KccAns: Recommended for control of fungal attack spray copper oxychloride 30-40gm/pump and streptocyclin 2 gram at 15 liter of water
kisan bhai aap NPK-19:19:19 1 kg/acre/120 liter pani ki dar se prayog kare .
H.A.U. Helpline no. 1800-180-3001 contact :-Monday ,Wednesday,and Friday (10 am to 1 pm)

QueryText: Farmer wants to know information about how to increase growth of wheat crop?
KccAns: Recommended for to increase growth of wheat foliar application of iffco 0:52:34 water soluble fertilizer @ 100 gm/pump.
Recommended to spray Imidacloprid 17.8 SL.- 0.5 ml per lit. water and Recommended to spray Chlorpyriphos 20 EC.- 2.0 ml per lit. water

QueryText: root knots problem with plum crop?
KccAns: carbofuron 10 kg/acre + sand  8-10 kg/acre , sath me mix kre
